leve.name: Burn It Down
leve.description: A bonfire burns in the woods this day, and burn it must until the coblyns' unspeakable harvest is reduced to ashes as fine as snuff and pale as morning prayer. The Black Boars would stay to guard the flames, but an urgent hunt calls us away. We petition you to keep alive the flame, no matter who─or what─comes to douse it.
leve.client: The Order of the Twin Adder Black Boars
